Package core

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Vec
      • core.Vec4
        • core.Color
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUtils, IVec, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Vec4>, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Float>
    public class Color
extends Vec4
    A mutable, extensible class. Supports RGBA and HSBA color spaces. Supports conversion to and from integers where color channels are in the format 0xAARRGGBB.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Color.AbstrEasing
      An abstract class to facilitate the creation of color easing functions.
      static class  Color.ComparatorBri
      Compares two colors by brightness.
      static class  Color.ComparatorHsb
      An abstract class to facilitate the creation of HSB comparators.
      static class  Color.ComparatorHue
      Compares two colors by hue.
      static class  Color.ComparatorSat
      Compares two colors by saturation.
      static class  Color.HueCCW
      Eases the hue in the counter-clockwise direction.
      static class  Color.HueCW
      Eases between hues in the clockwise direction.
      static class  Color.HueEasing
      An abstract parent class for hue easing functions.
      static class  Color.HueFar
      Eases between hues by the furthest clockwise direction.
      static class  Color.HueNear
      Eases between hues by the nearest clockwise direction.
      static class  Color.MixHsba
      Eases between colors by hue, saturation and brightness.
      static class  Color.SmoothStepRgba
      Eases between two colors with the smooth step formula: t x t x ( 3.0 - 2.0 x t ) .

        Returns:
        the HSBA vector

      • rgbaToHsba

        public static Vec4 rgbaToHsba​(float red,
                              float green,
                              float blue,
                              float alpha,
                              Vec4 target)
        Converts rgba channels to a vector which holds hue, saturation, brightness and alpha.
        Parameters:
        red - the red channel
        green - the green channel
        blue - the blue channel
        alpha - the alpha channel
        target - the output vector
        Returns:
        the HSBA values
        See Also:
        Utils.max(float...), Utils.min(float...), IUtils.ONE_SIX

      • toHexInt

        public static int toHexInt​(Color c)
        Converts a color to an integer where hexadecimal represents the ARGB color channels: 0xAARRGGB .
        Parameters:
        c - the input color
        Returns:
        the color in hexadecimal

      • toHexString

        public static java.lang.String toHexString​(Color c)
        Returns a Java-friendly representation of the color as a hexadecimal code, preceded by a '0x', in the format AARRGGBB.
        Parameters:
        c - the color
        Returns:
        the string

        c - the color
        Returns:
        the string

      • clone

        public Color clone()
        Returns a new color with this color's components. Java's cloneable interface is problematic; use set or a copy constructor instead.
        Overrides:
        clone in class Vec4
        Returns:
        a new color
        See Also:
        set(Color), Color(Color)

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Color c)
        Returns -1 when this color is less than the comparisand; 1 when it is greater than; 0 when the two are 'equal'. The implementation of this method allows collections of colors to be sorted. This depends upon the static comparator of the Color class, which can be changed.
        Parameters:
        c - the comparisand
        Returns:
        the numeric code
        See Also:
        COMPARATOR
